verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
A fountain springs up in the valley;
Waters deep and crystal clear.
My love for You is like that fountain,
And my springs are all in You.
Chorus:
A fountain springing up,
A river flowing out,
And whosoever will may come,
The waters that I give you,
Are springing up within you,
And you will never thirst again.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The fountain flows into the river,
Living waters, running deep,
The current moving is so strong,
That it will flow eternally.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And as we drink these living waters,
Our roots together go down deep.
And we'll bear fruit in every season,
For we are planted like a tree.
